titleStmt.title: The lamentable sufferings of the church of God in Dorset-shire and the persecution there, whipping sufficient men of their own county as vagabonds, and how bruitish they behave themselves and unmanly, dishonouring their magistracy, and shaming their ministery ...
titleStmt.author: Curtis, Samuel.

titleStmt.title: The lamentable sufferings of the church of God in Dorset-shire and the persecution there, whipping sufficient men of their own county as vagabonds, and how bruitish they behave themselves and unmanly, dishonouring their magistracy, and shaming their ministery ...

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Curtis by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
